homepage.quote: Designing, coding, and innovating to shape the digital world with a full-stack touch.

about.title: Who is Arpit?
about.subtitle: A curiosity-driven Full Stack Developer crafting digital worlds with Angular, React, and Node.
about.bio-1: Hey Visitor, I am a seasoned Full Stack Developer with a strong command of Angular, React, and Node.js. My expertise spans the entire web development spectrum, allowing me to seamlessly navigate both the front-end and back-end realms. With a commitment to staying abreast of industry trends, I am poised to contribute innovation and excellence to every project, providing robust and user-centric web applications.
about.bio-2: Leveraging Angular and React, I craft engaging, responsive user interfaces that deliver exceptional user experiences. On the server side, I harness the power of Node.js to build scalable and efficient applications. Proficient in database management, API design, and version control, I ensure the entire development process is cohesive and well-structured.
about.bio-3: My problem-solving skills, combined with a knack for optimizing CI/CD pipelines, enable me to deliver high-quality, performance-driven solutions.I'm not available for any freelance work, but feel free to reach out and say hello! I promise I don't bite ðŸ˜‰

hashedin.title: HashedIn By Deloitte
hashedin.description: Constantly evolving to stay at the forefront of industry trends. This experience has allowed me to contribute meaningfully to innovative projects while honing my skills in a dynamic and forward-thinking work environment.
